text: The purpose of this study was to investigate the host factors that influence disease severity following JEV infection in a mouse model. In particular, we focused on the variation of disease outcome in individual mice following extraneural infection with JEV. We first compared the pathogenicity of two JEV strains, which cause either dose-dependent or doseindependent mortality responses. We next compared severe or mild cases of mice infected with JEV exhibiting doseindependent mortality and investigated the specific host responses such as TNF-Î± and IL-10 expression in the CNS.
